TopicTitle: I just flew an asteroid. Mostly. It was a work of art.

Articles.Content:
Here have this: http://www.twitch.tv/avera9ejoe/c/4177436

So I was going to put wings on the side that had engines and I was going to try and land it on the run way although I ran out of time in my suborbital. So I went out with style.

On another note...

So I made this in about 10 minutes because personally I think Scott Manley should do some stupid thing with Shrek and kerbals as they are both green and he has the accent. At least close enough.
